DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether acupuncture and computer-based attention training can be combined for more effective post-stroke attentional deficits.
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture and Computer-based Training to Improve Attention Deficits in Patients After Stroke
DOC.criteria: Admitted to inpatient stroke rehabilitation within six months after firstever stroke Mild cognitive impairments (attention performance TAP > 1 standard deviation below mean agematched norm in at least one subtest). Conscious, stable physical condition and signed informed consent of patient. Severe visual and/or hearing problems Inability to follow instructions (MoCA) Disorders of speech and instruction comprehension (tested with a modified tokentest) Severe visual and/or hearing problems Preexisting mental disorders Pregnancy
